ygData.msgSnippet: Release 1.10.0 adds new configuration options, experimental new protocol and format support, and lots of fixes (43 tracked bugs have been fixed and 35 feature

From: Michael Stack <stack@...>
Subject: [ANN] Heritrix 1.10.0 release
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281; y=ytUGKZRRY9ewlfbVPewMSbTJszft5I7AUtxQyF6RjhZaL2neMZgEIGul
X-Yahoo-Profile: stackarchiveorg

Release 1.10.0 adds new configuration options, experimental new protocol 
and format support, and lots of fixes (43 tracked bugs have been fixed 
and 35 feature requests added). It requires JDK 1.5.x. 

There have been some changes that may come as a bit of a surprise -- 
e.g. Heritrix is now by default only accessible from localhost and you 
are now required to set the admin login and password explicitly -- so 
for sure review the Changes section in the Release Notes at a minimum 
[See http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes/1_10_0.html].

Yours,
Internet Archive Webteam
